abstract.p: McCann-Erickson World Group is selling AdWare Systems to Mediaplex for estimated $27.3 million in cash and stock; Partners & Simons is acquiring Eymer Design (S)

block.p: The McCann-Erickson World Group in New York, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies, is selling AdWare Systems, which offers media management application services, to Mediaplex in San Francisco for an estimated $27.3 million in cash and stock. AdWare, which has offices in Louisville, Ky., New York and Toronto, will operate as an autonomous unit of Mediaplex, an online advertising technology company.

The McCann-Erickson World Group in New York, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies, is selling AdWare Systems, which offers media management application services, to Mediaplex in San Francisco for an estimated $27.3 million in cash and stock. AdWare, which has offices in Louisville, Ky., New York and Toronto, will operate as an autonomous unit of Mediaplex, an online advertising technology company.

And Partners & Simons in Boston is acquiring Eymer Design in Boston, an interactive and new media agency that will be merged into Partners & Simons. Terms were not disclosed. Doug Eymer, 38, president at Eymer, becomes principal and creative director at Partners & Simons.
